snippet: The drug accounted for 1.7 percent of the 257 million prescriptions written in 2009 for opioid pain relievers, but it was involved in 31.4 percent of overdose deaths.
abstract: The drug accounted for 1.7 percent of the 257 million prescriptions written in 2009 for opioid pain relievers, but it was involved in 31.4 percent of overdose deaths.

headline.main: Many Fatal Overdoses Linked to Methadone
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Patterns: Many Fatal Overdoses Linked to Methadone
